comments:
1. Create a new plug-in project
2. Create a copy of file build.properties and name it build.properties.product
3. Try to open it in an editor by double-clicking it in the Package Explorer

moving to runtime for comment... why would this return INDETERMINATE when PDE properly uses the proper xml contenttype with proper paramter. Is it because it is expecting an XML file and gets a simply props file so it can't determine the root element?
Looks like it will return INDETERMINATE if the file doesn't have enough bytes to even think about being an XML file?
